flawed_nl_solution:
Each employee needs $35000-$20000=$<<35000-20000=14980>>14980 more per year.
In total, Emily needs to pay $14980*10=$<<14980*10=149800>>149800 extra.
Emily will need to have a new salary of $1000000-$149800=$<<1000000-149800=850200>>850200 per year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15000, not 14980. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
